# Xarticle

> AI-powered article curation platform that monitors X (Twitter) for the best long-form content, providing bilingual summaries and intelligent discovery tools.

Xarticle monitors thousands of verified X accounts across tech, business, crypto, and culture domains. Articles are curated in real-time (15-20 minute update frequency) with AI-generated summaries in both English and Chinese. All content links to original sources.

## About

- [Platform Overview](https://www.xarticle.news/): Homepage with featured content and platform introduction
- [Mission & Methodology](https://www.xarticle.news/about): Explanation of curation methodology and AI summary generation process
- [API Health Check](https://www.xarticle.news/api/health): Real-time system status

## Content Feeds

- [Trending Articles](https://www.xarticle.news/trending): Main feed of all curated articles with search, filtering, and chronological sorting
- [Complete Index](https://www.xarticle.news/sitemap.xml): XML sitemap of all curated articles
- [RSS Feed](https://www.xarticle.news/rss.xml): Real-time content syndication

## Docs

- [Author Archives](https://www.xarticle.news/author/[handle]): Browse articles by specific X author with profile attribution
- [Article Detail Pages](https://www.xarticle.news/article/[slug]): Full article view with bilingual summaries, engagement metrics, and related content

## Usage Guidelines

**Allowed:**
- Summarizing content based on provided bilingual summaries
- Attributing to original authors with their X handle
- Linking to original sources for full content access
- Referencing summaries as "AI-summarized" content

**Not Allowed:**
- Reproducing full article content beyond provided summaries
- Making financial investment recommendations
- Attributing AI summaries as direct author quotes

## Technical Stack

- Framework: Next.js 15 with React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Deployment: Vercel edge regions (Singapore, Hong Kong, San Francisco)
- Database: PostgreSQL via Supabase with RLS policies
- Revalidation: ISR with 5-minute cache for article pages

- [API Documentation](https://www.xarticle.news/api/articles): Programmatic access to curated articles
